entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this afternoon. Snow over northern sections. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
